alert.note: Alert for Cass (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 19 at 3:35PM EST until January 20 at 10:00PM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Lowered visibility to less than a mile will be possible in the heavier snow. * WHERE...In Indiana, Elkhart County. In Michigan, Cass MI County. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 10 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The lake effect snow bands are expected to make their way back to this area tonight bringing additional lake effect snow. There is some question about if the lake effect snow band will be able to maintain itself Saturday morning and set up across Cass county Michigan to bring more snow to the area.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
